shared.Rights module¶

Permission Rights

Defines for Rights types

shared.Rights.ALL = 15¶

Allowed to CRUD

shared.Rights.CREATE = 4¶

Allowed to create records

shared.Rights.DELETE = 8¶

Allowed to delete records

shared.Rights.INVALID = 1000¶

REST invalid rights error code

shared.Rights.READ = 1¶

Allowed to read records

shared.Rights.UPDATE = 2¶

Allowed to update records

shared.Rights.check(sesh, name, right, ident=None, return_failure=False)¶

Check

Checks’s if the currently signed in user has the requested right on the given permission. If the user has rights, nothing happens, else an exception of ResponseException is raised

Parameters

  • sesh (RestOC.Sesh._Session) – The current session

  • name (str) – The name of the permission to check

  • right (uint) – The right to check for

  • ident (str) – Optional identifier to check against

  • return_failure (bool) – If true, return failure instead of raising an exception

Raises

ResponseException –

Returns

None

shared.Rights.checkReturn(sesh, name, right, ident=None)¶

Check Return

Same as check, but returns the result instead of raising an exception

Parameters

  • sesh (RestOC.Sesh._Session) – The current session

  • name (str) – The name of the permission to check

  • right (uint) – The right to check for

  • ident (str) – Optional identifier to check against

Returns

bool
